title: Riot please have the Snowdown spirit I need only 2 rp for Dragon Trainer Tristana
body:
I have loved playing trist since she came out and have gotten almost every skin, call me addicted but I love this little cannon carrying yordle. All I need is 2 RP for this little lady and her dragon baby. I would be overjoyed if anything could be done! PLEASE RITO I've been a good boy this year. 
http://imgur.com/0DZZoE0
